titles.title: A bill to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on 4,4N-Oxydiphthalic anhydride.
A bill to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on 4,4N-Oxydiphthalic anhydride.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend temporarily the suspension of duty on 4,4N-Oxydiphthalic anhydride.
